entries.message: An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Chicago location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-12-11 05:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-12-11 12:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Chicago instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Seattle location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-12-11 08:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-12-11 14:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Seattle instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

We are currently experiencing degraded network performance in our Melbourne, Sydney location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

We are currently experiencing degraded network performance in our Melbourne, Sydney location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

Event Type: Object Storage Infrastructure Maintenance
Start Time: 2025-12-10 14:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-12-10 16:00:00 UTC

Our Cloud Storage team will be performing upgrades to our New Jersey Object Storage (endpoint ewr2.vultrobjects.com) infrastructure starting at 2025-12-10 14:00:00 UTC. Customers of the Performance and Accelerated Object Storage may experience a brief interruption.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Mumbai location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-12-10 18:25:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-12-10 23:25:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Mumbai instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Mexico City location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-12-09 05:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-12-09 09:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Mexico City instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

We are currently experiencing degraded network performance in our Bangalore location with international connectivity to India.  You may experience slower speeds or intermittent connectivity across all of our upstream transit providers. We will provide updates as more information becomes available.
